name: 中小企業行銷管理
description: This is a fundamental course in marketing management aiming at helping the MOT major students become familiar with modern marketing management and high technology marketing management theories and practices. Major emphasis will be placed on marketing theory introduction and case studies. The students are expected to skills in market segmentation, targeting, positioning, product management, brand management, pricing management, market research, and marketing planning through lectures and case studies.
goals: 瞭解近代科技行銷理論與管理實務
